thread.title: Michelle Obama Hung Out With Prince Harry In London
thread.title_full: Michelle Obama Hung Out With Prince Harry In London

title: Michelle Obama Hung Out With Prince Harry In London
text:
reddit 
First lady Michelle Obama hung out with Prince Harry during a visit to London to promote her "Let Girls Learn" initiative. 
Obama and her daughters, Sasha and Malia, joined Prince Harry for tea Tuesday at Kensington Palace before visiting a girls' school in east London. Royal officials said the first lady and the prince discussed the education initiative and support for veterans during the meeting, NBC News reported Tuesday . 
The first lady and her daughters will also have tea with Prime Minister David Cameron and his wife, Samantha. 
The U.S. and U.K. announced a partnership Tuesday to help advance adolescent girls' education worldwide. 
"The two countries pledged renewed efforts to accelerate progress in overcoming barriers that adolescent girls face in achieving an education, with a particular focus on fragile countries," the nations said in a joint statement Tuesday. Also on HuffPost:
